metadata.description: Principal Architect for real-time chess gaming monorepos (NestJS + Next.js + Redis/Socket.IO). 4-phase stabilization, anti-cheat pipelines, and 5 specialized agents.

plugins.description: Principal Staff Engineer + Real-Time Systems Architect. Manages microservices health, WebSocket scaling, anti-cheat analysis, test coverage gaps, and 4-phase stabilization roadmap with 5 delegatable specialized agents.
